                          long timeout,
                          TimeUnit unit)
                   throws InterruptedException
        Description copied from interface: Semaphore
        try to acquire a number of permits.
        Specified by:
        tryAcquire in interface Semaphore
        Parameters:
        nrPermits - number of permits to acquire.
        timeout - time to wait for permits to become available.
        unit - units of time.
        Returns:
        true if permits acquired, false if timed out.
        Throws:
        InterruptedException - - operation interrupted.
